description.description: Want to get up and running with Sanity.io? Your content is data and should be treated as such. When using Sanity, you are able to structure your content and use it wherever you need, however you need! In this video, I'll show you how to get Sanity started for any project.

heroDescription.heroDescription: Avocado Labs is a way to keep people connected online and have access to quality talks. There will be live talks, which will then be uploaded, where expert speakers can share their knowledge. After each talk there will be a 5min Q&A where our speakers will be able to answer any related questions you may have. These episodes will be hosted and moderated by our Auth0 developer advocates to ensure a safe and friendly environment.

childMarkdownRemark.rawMarkdownBody: Want to get up and running with Sanity.io? Your content is data and should be treated as such. When using Sanity, you are able to structure your content and use it wherever you need, however you need! In this video, I'll show you how to get Sanity started for any project. This is a Q&A session about sanity.io.

intro.intro: Kapehe does Developer Relations for Sanity.io. Based out of Las Vegas, she likes teaching others all about code. Some of her favorite things to teach are React, Next, and of course, Sanity! When not working, you can find Kapehe playing with her dog, her two cats, and her two bunnies.
